import {useState} from 'react' const AddTask = ({task, onDelete, onToggle}) => { // we w3ant to access these form other component, use api so you can pull different pieces of state from it. const [text, setText] = useState('') const [day, setDay] = useState('') const [reminder, setReminder] = useState(false) return (
setText(e.target.value)} />
setDay(e.target.value)} />
setReminder(e.currentTarget.checked)} />
) } export default AddTask;
